ygData.subject: Strange idea to try on next Nafagen raid
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is a wild idea for the melee types in the next Naf raid you may go on. Have them buy potions of Stalwart Regeneration, this potion give a small regen
ygData.messageBody:
Here is a wild idea for the melee types in the next Naf raid you may go on.
Have them buy potions of Stalwart Regeneration, this potion give a small
regen effect and roots the drinker. This way they will not get feared into
the lava as they will be rooted (this assumes the fighters are bright enough
to drink the potion AFTER getting in melee range of Lord Naf).

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

EQ Bard Song Analysis
http://rgonzalez.net/EQSongs/
